extendedInfo.description: Easily ("zero"-click!) backup/restore your applications with their data & disable bloatware. The tool will not do useless backups (unless app/data did actually change).ROOT required.

reviews.title: Deal breaker
reviews.comment: Fine backup program, but it\'s missing one essential feature which made me go back to Titanium Backup: you can only disable system apps, and can\'t un-install them like you can on TB. If that feature was added I\'d be all over this as my one-stop backup shop but sadly until then I\'m stuck with TB.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crap! Needed to reset phone. Backed up all user apps, did reset, reinstalled Delta Backup. It doesn\'t even detect it\'s own backup files. Crap!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Qw
reviews.comment: Only app that restored titanium backup properly. Hope you guys still working on it, looking forward to future update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: need filter & sorting
reviews.comment: error during backup,and can\'t complete backup of many apps.  Pls offer filter for easy looking specific app, and sorting for easy finding those without backup or outdated or backup file existed but app inexisted
reviews.author: Rio Wong

reviews.comment: When I try to test restore apps that I just uninstalled, it says- install failed insufficient storage. Sad because there is much potential.Android 2.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t use external sd
reviews.comment: For my phone the backup needs to be on the external sd to be useful. This app doesn\'t let you specify the backup folder to use the external sd card. It\'s hard coded to use the internal sd card (which is only external on some phones). That\'s a big flaw. The other flaw is that it zips up the apk data like Titanium Backup does so you can\'t easily restore it manually if you needed to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: app so slow to respond that my click registers 2sec later.. accidentally on the uninstall button popup! no confirmation asked.. app uninstalled!! :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works perfectly. Does silent app install unlike Titanium. I use it regularly for switching between ROMs and it never let me down.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect app...
reviews.comment: It does exactly what I needed to do. Now my phone doesn\'t keep telling me low memory every time I download a new app(only got 175mb of onboard) awesome app...
reviews.author: A Google User
